Question: Scope3 CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Scope3

CES 2024

- Next-generation AI processor for enhanced performance
- Advanced 8K display technology for stunning visuals
- Cutting-edge connectivity options including 5G and Wi-Fi 6E
- Sleek and modern design with slim bezels for immersive viewing experience
- Intuitive user interface for seamless navigation and control
- Enhanced audio technology for immersive sound experience
- Smart home integration for seamless connectivity and control
- Eco-friendly design with energy-efficient components and materials
Summary_cn:
范围3

CES 2024

- 强化性能的下一代人工智能处理器
- 令人惊叹的先进8K显示技术
- 包括5G和Wi-Fi 6E在内的前沿连接选项
- 极富吸引力的纤薄边框设计，带来沉浸式视觉体验
- 直观的用户界面，实现无缝导航和控制
- 强化音频技术，提供沉浸式音效体验
- 智能家居集成，实现无缝连接和控制
- 环保设计，采用节能元件和材料
